最后一天AFASG17也结束了！真的真的很感谢所有来看我们的小伙伴😭说实话这次真的有很多不安，第五次参加AFA了，陆续的也听到一些网络上的人说一些类似，为什么每一年都是我们，希望能换邀请其他人参加的话…就连我的同学也和我说，走了一年后新加坡的粉丝估计都忘记我们了orz（每次都纠结的一整晚都睡不着orz
Finally finished AFASG17 last day! Really really thanks all of you who came to see us. In fact? We were very nervous at the beginning as it's our 5th time attend AFA, we also heard some complain from the internet asking why invited us again, hope to see more new face.... even my classmates told me that your Singapore fans will forget you since you left SG one year. (It made me hard to sleep everytime i heard of these)

今年真的有蛮多不同，自从我们回国一年后，很多朋友也去了其他国家，说实话稍微觉得有点寂寞…（连我们的英语变差好多😂……但在漫展上看到了很多熟悉的面孔，觉得大家一直都在等我们，还一直问会不会再有新加坡fm，心里真的真的很感动😭大家一直都还在，讲到这里我就有点想哭了QAQ（虽然明年大概暂时不会办fm了😭😭
It has been a big change this year. Since we left SG 1 year, a lot of friends also went to other countries, to be honest that made us feel a bit longly here. (Even our English become worse.... but we still saw a lot of familiar faces during the event, we knew you are all waiting for us, and also asked is if there will be a fm again in SG, we were really touched - you are always here, i almost cry why i typed here QAQ ( but there may not be a FM next year....)

在我们的新书《Touch》的开头，写了一段想对所有我们的粉丝，虽然不知道这段话能不能传递到一些错过了或是离开的粉丝那边，都想要感谢你们，我一直觉得我们的粉丝最可爱了，无论是你们为我们高兴为我们难过还是为我们生气，我们都很喜欢😭
At the beginning of our new book "Touch", we have written all we want to say to our fans. I am not sure if these can be delivered to those who have left, but we still want to thank you. We always think our fans are the most lovely fans on the world. Whenever you are happy or angry or sad for us, we all appreciate that.

无论如何今年也圆满结束了，我们最喜欢新加坡了，在这生活的三年是我人生最幸福的一段时光，如果可以明年我们也希望能来到新加坡和大家见面😭请千万不要忘记我们！
Anyway, it finished so good this year, we love Singapore the most. The 3 year experience here was my happiest period in my life. If possible we hope can come back and meet everyone again! Please don't forget us!!

Hi everyone! Here's the first wave of publicity for the long-awaited SGFM2.0!

We are glad to organise this event in collaboration with SG Fanclub~ The date is set on 20 May, and this is the only chance for us to meet everyone in first half of this year, hope everyone can support us💪💪 Similar to last year, the FM will be split into morning session (Casual) and afternoon session (Cosplay, we will cos as Victor and Yuri☺)! (Prizes include not-for-sale items such as cushions and wall scroll posters~) In appreciation of our Singapore fans' support for so many years, the ticket price will be reduced to SGD22, while at the same time, we will add on more event gifts; besides tote bags, postcards and badges, we are considering to prepare items like keychains as event gifts~ Hope everyone will like them~ Of course, there will be new merchandise for sale at the event, which we will announce in advance~

Lastly, as the date of event is close to Hana's birthday, we will be celebrating his birthday together during the event~ Hope everyone will enjoy yourselves in this FM!
